questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
questions.explanation: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language, which is the standard markup language for creating web pages.

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to change the text color?
questions.explanation: The 'color' property is used to set the text color in CSS.

questions.question: What is the correct way to include JavaScript in an HTML file?
questions.explanation: The <script> tag is used to include JavaScript in an HTML file.

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to create a hyperlink?
questions.explanation: The <a> tag is used to create hyperlinks in HTML.

questions.question: What is the purpose of CSS?
options: To create the structure of a webpage
To add interactivity to a webpage
To style and layout web pages
questions.explanation: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and layout web pages.
